title: Rudra: Secret of the Black Moon
short_cast: Shailendra Pandey, Vinod Kulkarni, Rohan, Mukesh Pandey, Bhakti Shalini, Ghanshyam Shukla, Pankaj Kalra, Kanchan, Sanchit Wartak, Ajay Singhal
cast: Shailendra Pandey, Vinod Kulkarni, Rohan, Mukesh Pandey, Bhakti Shalini, Ghanshyam Shukla, Pankaj Kalra, Kanchan, Sanchit Wartak, Ajay Singhal
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: Kid magician Rudra sets out to save Earth from the demon of Black Moon planet, but can he get the job done if his spells don’t work on enemy territory?
